name: Tag Cloud 3D
author: scriptcase

sections.description:
This Tag Cloud displays your site’s tags in a rotating three dimensional tag cloud.

The following configuration options are available:

  1. Title of the Tag Cloud.
  2. Number of tags to be displayed.
  3. Height and Width of the widget.
  4. Background Color.
  5. Text Color.
  6. Font.
  7. Font maximum size.
  8. Font minimum size.

Support

Thanks for downloading and installing my plugin.

Translation

Translation is enabled for this plugin. If someone interested in translating this plugin please visit the following link and post in the comments section with your contact email. Thanks.

Translated languages

  • French
  • German (Translated by Simon Lang)
  • Portuguese – Brazilian (Translated by Valdir Trombini).
  • Spanish
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the plugin to your blog.
  3. Activate it.
  4. Go to widget menu, then drag and drop the 3d Tag Cloud in the area where you want to display it.

Done!

Uninstalling is as simple as deactivating the plugin.
sections.faq:
None yet, if you have one email me at www.scriptcase.net@gmail.net

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload the plugin to your blog.
  3. Activate it.
  4. Go to widget menu, then drag and drop the 3d Tag Cloud in the area where you want to display it.

Done!

Uninstalling is as simple as deactivating the plugin.
